<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <FrameLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/gradient_background_main">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="80dp" android:gravity="center">
<!-- Centered Logo and Wordmark Vertically --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center">
<!-- Much Bigger Centered Logo --> <ImageView android:layout_width="500dp" android:layout_height="500dp" android:src="@drawable/logo" android:contentDescription="WaterFountain logo" android:scaleType="fitCenter" android:layout_marginBottom="60dp"/>
<!-- Much Bigger Wordmark Below Logo --> <ImageView android:layout_width="800dp" android:layout_height="160dp" android:src="@drawable/white_word_mark" android:contentDescription="WaterFountain wordmark" android:scaleType="fitCenter" android:adjustViewBounds="true" android:layout_marginBottom="20dp"/>
<!-- Tagline under wordmark --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Always free from our fountains" android:textSize="36sp" android:textColor="#B3FFFFFF" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-light" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="40dp"/>
<!-- Bigger instruction text --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Press anywhere to start" android:textSize="48sp" android:textColor="#80FFFFFF" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-light" android:gravity="center"/>
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Bottom Info Section with Question Mark --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="bottom|center_horizontal" android:layout_marginBottom="60dp" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<!-- Question Mark Icon in Circle --> <FrameLayout android:id="@+id/questionMarkButton" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/circle_background" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true">
<TextView android:id="@+id/questionMarkIcon" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:text="?" android:textSize="24sp" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium"/>
</FrameLayout>
<!-- "Powered by local businesses" text --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Powered by local businesses" android:textSize="28sp" android:textColor="#80FFFFFF" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-light"/>

<!-- Modal Content --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/modalContent" android:layout_width="800dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:background="@drawable/modal_background" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="60dp" android:gravity="center">
<!-- Modal Title --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Why is this free?" android:textSize="42sp" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="30dp"/>
<!-- Modal Message --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Our spring water is completely free. Nature doesn't charge, so neither do we. Instead, we partner with local businesses who cover the cost to keep you hydrated.\n\nGet one every single day with your phone number" android:textSize="32sp" android:textColor="#E0FFFFFF" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-light" android:gravity="center" android:lineSpacingExtra="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="40dp"/>
<!-- Close Button --> <TextView android:id="@+id/closeModalButton" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Got it!" android:textSize="36sp" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:background="@drawable/button_background" android:paddingHorizontal="40dp" android:paddingVertical="16dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:gravity="center"/>
</LinearLayout>
</FrameLayout>
</FrameLayout>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <FrameLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/gradient_background_main">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="80dp" android:gravity="center">

<ImageButton android:id="@+id/backButton" android:layout_width="120dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" android:contentDescription="@string/back_button" android:src="@drawable/ic_arrow_back" android:alpha="0.9" android:padding="20dp" android:scaleType="fitCenter" app:tint="@android:color/white" />
</FrameLayout>
<!-- Centered Logo and Wordmark - this will be truly centered now --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:gravity="center" android:orientation="horizontal">
<ImageView android:layout_width="140dp" android:layout_height="140dp" android:layout_marginEnd="30dp" android:src="@drawable/logo" android:contentDescription="@string/waterfountain_logo" android:scaleType="fitCenter" />
<ImageView android:layout_width="400dp" android:layout_height="80dp" android:src="@drawable/white_word_mark" android:contentDescription="@string/waterfountain_wordmark" android:scaleType="fitCenter" android:adjustViewBounds="true"/>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Empty space to balance the back button --> <View android:layout_width="140dp" android:layout_height="match_parent" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Main Content Area --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center">
<!-- Title --> <TextView android:id="@+id/titleText" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Choose Your\nVerification Method" android:textSize="72sp" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:gravity="center" android:lineSpacingExtra="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="60dp"/>
<!-- Subtitle --> <TextView android:id="@+id/subtitleText" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Both methods are free and secure" android:textSize="48sp" android:textColor="#B3FFFFFF" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-light" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="120dp"/>
<!-- Option Cards --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginHorizontal="40dp">
<!-- SMS Option - Active (left) --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/smsCard" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="580dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:background="@drawable/card_gradient_background" android:layout_marginEnd="20dp" android:padding="40dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true">
<ImageView android:layout_width="140dp" android:layout_height="140dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_phone_elegant" app:tint="#2196F3" android:contentDescription="Phone icon" android:layout_marginBottom="30dp"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Phone Number" android:textSize="36sp" android:textColor="#333333" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-black" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="No app needed" android:textSize="24sp" android:textColor="#666666" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text=" Works offline\n Privacy focused\n ~45 seconds" android:textSize="20sp" android:textColor="#666666" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:gravity="center" android:lineSpacingExtra="4dp"/>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- PIN Code Option - Disabled/Coming Soon (center) --> <FrameLayout android:id="@+id/pinCodeCard" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="580dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginHorizontal="20dp" android:background="@drawable/card_gradient_background" android:clickable="false" android:focusable="false" android:alpha="0.6">
<!-- Base card content --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:padding="40dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="140dp" android:layout_height="140dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_pin_code" app:tint="#2196F3" android:contentDescription="PIN Code icon" android:layout_marginBottom="30dp" android:alpha="0.5"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="PIN Code" android:textSize="36sp" android:textColor="#333333" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-black" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" android:alpha="0.5"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="From mobile app" android:textSize="24sp" android:textColor="#666666" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" android:alpha="0.5"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text=" Account required\n Most secure\n ~30 seconds" android:textSize="20sp" android:textColor="#666666" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:gravity="center" android:lineSpacingExtra="4dp" android:alpha="0.5"/>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Rounded overlay with proper corners --> <View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/overlay_rounded_background" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:gravity="center" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="COMING SOON" android:textSize="32sp" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-black" android:gravity="center" android:background="@drawable/coming_soon_rounded_background" android:paddingHorizontal="32dp" android:paddingVertical="16dp" android:textStyle="bold" android:letterSpacing="0.1"/>
</LinearLayout>
</FrameLayout>
<!-- QR Code Option - Disabled/Coming Soon (right) --> <FrameLayout android:id="@+id/qrCodeCard" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="580dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginStart="20dp" android:background="@drawable/card_gradient_background" android:clickable="false" android:focusable="false" android:alpha="0.6">
<!-- Base card content --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:padding="40dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="140dp" android:layout_height="140dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_qr_code" app:tint="#2196F3" android:contentDescription="QR Code icon" android:layout_marginBottom="30dp" android:alpha="0.5"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Scan QR Code" android:textSize="36sp" android:textColor="#333333" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-black" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" android:alpha="0.5"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Instant No typing" android:textSize="24sp" android:textColor="#666666" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" android:alpha="0.5"/>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text=" Works everywhere\n No account needed\n ~15 seconds" android:textSize="20sp" android:textColor="#666666" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:gravity="center" android:lineSpacingExtra="4dp" android:alpha="0.5"/>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Rounded overlay with proper corners --> <View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/overlay_rounded_background" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:gravity="center" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="COMING SOON" android:textSize="32sp" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-black" android:gravity="center" android:background="@drawable/coming_soon_rounded_background" android:paddingHorizontal="32dp" android:paddingVertical="16dp" android:textStyle="bold" android:letterSpacing="0.1"/>
</LinearLayout>
</FrameLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Footer Instruction --> <!-- Bottom Info Section with Question Mark --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="bottom|center_horizontal" android:layout_marginTop="40dp" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:padding="20dp">
<!-- Question Mark Icon in Circle with extra space to prevent clipping --> <FrameLayout android:id="@+id/questionMarkButton" android:layout_width="120dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:layout_marginEnd="20dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:elevation="6dp">
<!-- Circular background centered within the larger frame --> <View android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="80dp" android:layout_gravity="center" android:background="@drawable/circle_background"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/questionMarkIcon" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:text="?" android:textSize="44sp" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium"/>
</FrameLayout>
<!-- "Powered by local businesses" text --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Powered by local businesses" android:textSize="44sp" android:textColor="#B3FFFFFF" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-light"/>
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Modal Overlay (initially hidden) --> <FrameLayout android:id="@+id/modalOverlay" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="#80000000" android:visibility="gone" android:clickable="true">
<!-- Modal Content --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/modalContent" android:layout_width="800dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:background="@drawable/modal_background" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="60dp" android:gravity="center">
<!-- Modal Title --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Why is this free?" android:textSize="42sp" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="30dp"/>
<!-- Modal Message --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Our spring water is completely free. Nature doesn't charge, so neither do we. Instead, we partner with local businesses who cover the cost to keep you hydrated.\n\nGet one every single day with your phone number" android:textSize="32sp" android:textColor="#E0FFFFFF" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-light" android:gravity="center" android:lineSpacingExtra="8dp" android:layout_marginBottom="40dp"/>
